Thanks to everyone for your help with this. I will keep studying this 
piece and doing research.

One last question, though - If this was a "replica", would there be a 
hamon, or would it just be uniformly treated? I have some experience 
with polishing, and would like to learn the Japanese methods to 
supplement my Western knifemaking skills. Would it be worth the time to 
try to polish the blade, and does anyone know where I might be able to 
purchase Japanese polishing supplies?

Thanks!
Ben
